pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hemodynamic Response Function // Computes the hemodynamic response function (HRF) for task functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) data. Also includes functions for constructing a design matrix from task fMRI event timings, and for comparing multiple design matrices in a general linear model (GLM). A wrapper function is provided for GLM analysis of CIFTI-format data. Lastly, there are supporting functions which provide visual summaries of the HRFs and design matrices.
